Lot of people ask me for
Even if you pay me fortune, I will not do the above things. But at the same time, post a question that you are struggling after doing so and so, I will try my best to get you the answer.

It is easy for me to make things viral by leaking certification exam questions, building interview question bank, creating resumes, taking proxy interviews. With my skills, experience and understanding of nuances in IT industry I can support hundreds and make millions with a small team, but still I made a decision to move back to India and fix some fundamental problems in democratic way.
So, think twice before coming to me on the above things.

It is very important your career start in right foot and continue on right track for betterment of your self as well as the society we live in. Once it is on right track, your judgement between good vs. bad will improve.

You will get enormous energy to question no matter how powerful your counterpart is.  One will start thinking the ill effects of nepotism, corruption, fanaticism above and beyond caste, creed, region and religion.

Handling Recruitment Operations with TTS Solutions, Inc

•Independently managed 3 End Clients and 2 Tier 1 accounts & was responsible for getting new requirements and also staffing those requirements. Maintained exceptionally good relationship with client & vendor managers & hiring managers.•Led a team of 4 recruiters and mentored fellow recruiters•Was involved in the complete cycle of generating IT requirements, Fully understanding the client requirement, sourcing resources, negotiating rates/salaries, screening the candidate, conducting reference checks, presenting profile to the client, co-ordinating interviews, awaiting client feedback, ensuring candidate joins and finally maintaining constant contact & developing relationship with client and consultant.•Placed high-end technical professionals in the area of Information Technology Industry in contract, contract-Hire and full-time positions.•Recruited & placed Developers, QA Analysts, Business Analysts, Project Managers, System Administrators, DBAs, Accountants, Architects, and Data Modelers etc.•Laid a number of best recruitment practices for the company•Effectively recruited candidates through Internet research, internal database, cold calling, referrals, networking, and other strategies. •Responsible for checking references, negotiating terms and rates for each project, coordinating the interview process, extending offers, and closing on candidates.•Recruited US Citizens, Green Card Holders and H1B candidates.•Responsible for mentoring and providing on-going training and support for new recruiters and serve as a resource for learning and navigating senior technical policies and procedures.•Effectively used both Dice and Monster for posting new job requirements.•Was looked upon as the sole point of contact for answers to any questions related to the IT consulting industry.•Extensive working knowledge on Instihire, Icims and Pin Point for Job Posting, retrieving Job Details and Submissions.

•	Handled US recruitment in various Technologies. It involved interacting with consultants and clients to get the work done in a professional manner, including resumes screening, Job ad placement, negotiating rates, scheduling interviews, keep follow up etc.•	Involved in evaluation, placements, of consultants and employers in US market (RPO) and handling and manage the team of consultants in their respective technologies. •	Used to build up relationship with the prime vendors and the clients by calling them and enquiring about their need for manpower in their company’s and for their clients as well•	Expertise in full recruitment life cycle in IT staffing contracting and Permanent Placements in US market and well known about the cycles like W2 / 1099 / CTC.•	Excellent and having proficient knowledge in recruiting and Business Development techniques such as Vendor Networking, Job Boards, (Dice, Monster, Search 4 Jobs etc) Internet search and Internal Database. •	Dealt and Placed with almost all types authorized consultants such as US Citizens, GC’s, H1-B & TN Visa and Placing and Transferring H1-B's on our payrolls. •	Strong interpersonal and communication skills, creativity, excellent attitude towards teamwork•	Worked directly with hiring managers to cultivate requirements / consultants and new strategies•	Used personal contacts, made cold calls, and used search agents to find candidates, requirements and sales leads. •	Heavily used candidate resumes, submittals, interviews, closures, and sales recruiting tracking system. •	Worked with Preferred Vendors, Tier 1 and Implementing Partners•	Assignments worked for end clients of the preferred. •	Responsible for getting PO (Purchase Orders) and Master Agreements signed by vendors, and employers•	Responsible for posting advertisements for various Engineering professionals on computer job boards on the Internet.•	Creating and maintaining daily reports. Generation of weekly and monthly reports

•	We are the vendor of those companies and working directly with them and placing consultant on  C2C. Working with  H1B consultants.•	Internet Based Recruiting using Monster, Hot jobs, Dice, CareerBuilder’s, etc.•	Provided quality recruitment services via the recruiting life cycle.•	Gathered job requirements, Executive Search, sourcing, screening and interviewing viable candidates.•	Personally interviewed each candidate before submittal, checked references, and aptitude for applicable skill-set.•	Gathering all information about the consultant like if Citizen SSN#. •	Experts in reformatting candidate or consultant resumes according to the client style.Job Responsibilities:•	Reporting to Manager•	Initial screening and searching of the candidates using different portals according to client requirements. Interaction with the client•	Understanding the requirement and assigning and searching resumes.•	Experience in Corp-to-Corp•	Telephonic Evaluation for Contract•	Searching Resumes in FEE (like Monster, Career Builder and Hot jobs) and FREE sites•	2 to 3 hours Quick Resume Submission Process for Contract Assignments.•	Submitting Resumes to Manager and sometimes directly to the client.•	Supporting juniors plus giving Tips to make things faster•	Training new recruits with job activities•	Good Technical Knowledge (IT)•	Good convincing and Negotiation skills.•	Good Communication skills.	•	Good US industry recruitment experience		•	Negotiation Skills ,Client handling ,Vendor handling
